casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Joseph SCIORTINO, Antonio Santagate and Joseph Brancolino, Defendants-Appellants, and Julius Tingets et al., Defendants. No. 37. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 12, 1940. William I. Cohen, of New York City, for appellant Joseph Sciortino. Salvator P. Genuario, of Bridgeport, Conn., for appellants Joseph Braneolino and Antonio Santagate. Robert P. Butler, U. S. Atty., and Valentine J. Sacco, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Hartford, Conn., for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges

PER CURIAM.

Judgments affirmed.
